abstract.shortdesc: This is a DITA prettifier DITA-OT Plug-in which formats DITA XML in an aesthetically pleasing manner. topic elements, section elements, p elements etc are regularly indented so the raw DITA XML files can be scanned by humans:

body.p: A typical DITA file can contain long lines, missing carriage returns and un-aligned elements:

After running the pretty-dita transform, the same file will have all its elements aligned, each block element on a new line and text should not overrun the side of a typical view screen (approx 120 characters).
